settings.content:

settings.title: What is Fluid Immersion Simulation (FIS) technology?
settings.answer: FIS technology automatically adjusts to body weight and shape, simulating the effects of floating in fluid. This minimizes pressure on soft tissue, increases blood flow, and helps promote faster healing of wounds and ulcers.

settings.title: Can the bed be used in home care settings?
settings.answer: Absolutely. While it’s designed for clinical-grade performance, its safety features, adjustability, and ease of use make it suitable for both long-term care facilities and home environments.

settings.title: What is the DolphinCare Integrated Bed System?
settings.answer: The DolphinCare Integrated Bed System is an advanced medical bed designed to promote wound healing through Fluid Immersion Simulation (FIS) technology. It redistributes pressure to reduce tissue distortion, making it ideal for complex wound care and safe patient handling.

settings.title: Who is the DolphinCare bed intended for?
settings.answer: It is designed for patients at high risk of or currently suffering from pressure ulcers (up to Stage IV), as well as those recovering from post-operative flaps or grafts. It’s also suitable for patients with spinal cord injuries or conditions where turning and repositioning are contraindicated.

settings.title: Is the bed height adjustable?
settings.answer: Yes, the bed features a hi-lo design that allows the height to be adjusted between 7 to 30 inches to facilitate easier transfers and caregiving.

settings.title: What are the dimensions and weight specifications of the bed?
settings.answer:
• Length: 80 in.
  • Width: 35 or 42 in.
  • Height Range: 7–30 in.
  • Bed Weight: 200 lbs.
  • Safe Working Load: 500 lbs.

settings.title: Does this bed require special training to use?
settings.answer: No specialized training is required. Basic orientation is usually sufficient, as the system is designed with simplicity and ease-of-use in mind.

settings.title: Is the bed easy to operate?
settings.answer: Yes. Despite its advanced functionality, the DolphinCare bed is user-friendly and intuitive for all healthcare professionals, streamlining wound management without a steep learning curve.

settings.contact_info_text: If we still haven't answered your question, you can contact us below and we will get back to you as soon as possible.
